hero.title: Dominate Solana Meme Coins: Snipe in the Same Block & Copy the Pros – With {productName}.

problem.title: Lost in the Solana Meme Coin Frenzy? Pump.fun & Beyond: A High-Speed Game Where Seconds Decide (and Most Lose Out).

missedOpportunities.description: New coins moon before you can even click. By the time you see the launch, early buyers are already taking profits.

infoOverload.description: Which wallets to follow? Which coin is the next 100x? Too many options, too little reliable information.

frustration.title: Constant Frustration
frustration.description: Others always seem one step ahead. You're left wondering how they consistently get in early on winning trades.

solution.title: {productName}: Precision, Speed, and Strategy – Straight to Your Telegram.
solution.subtitle: We built Rust Rocket to level the playing field for ambitious traders like you. Get the edge you need to navigate the Solana meme coin market successfully.

copyTrading.title: Stop Guessing, Start Copying: {productName}'s Intelligent Copy Trading.
copyTrading.subtitle: Why spend hours analyzing wallets when Rust Rocket can find top performers and {automatically} execute their trades for you, {lightning}?
copyTrading.comparison: Other bots like Maestro, Bonk Bot, or Trojan might offer sniping, but only Rust Rocket empowers you with true Copy Trading – your definitive advantage.
copyTrading.dashboard: Our system (soon with live data in your dashboard!) identifies wallets with proven success.

step3.title: Your Wallet Profits

bdn.title: Outpace the Market: Same-Block Execution via Our Exclusive {bdnNetwork}.

sameBlock.title: Same-Block Execution: Maximum Impact.
sameBlock.description: Rust Rocket aims to execute your sniper and copy trades in the {exactSame} as the original event. No waiting, no delays, maximum hit rate.

gateways.title: 15 Proprietary BDN Gateways: Your Global Speed Advantage.
gateways.description: Our global network of 15 private, optimized Solana gateways (Block Dependent Network) ensures your transactions are routed via the fastest, most reliable paths, bypassing public congestion. This is the technological edge essential for successful sniping on pump.fun and beyond.

footer.riskText: Trading meme coins and using trading bots is highly speculative and involves substantial risk of financial loss, including total loss of funds. Rust Rocket is a software tool and does not constitute financial advice. Use at your own risk and trade responsibly.
